name: Marks & Spencer
description: One of Blue’s partner brands, Marks & Spencer gives the person you wish to gift, an extensive range of stylish, high quality clothing products to choose from, under the Marks and Spencer collection, across each category- womenswear, lingerie, menswear and kidswear.

name: Guess
description: Known worldwide for its innovative denim designs, GUESS is the ultimate, go-to lifestyle brand offering everything from wardrobe staples and seasonal favourites to fragrances, eyewear, accessories and timepieces.

name: Lifestyle
description: A Multi Brand store with a presence of 200 stores offering the widest range of Beauty & Fashion - Make up, Bath and Body, Teen Accessories, Fashion Bags & accessories. Also available are the exclusive spread of Home Décor, Bath Decor, Wall Décor, Chandeliers, Home Fragrance and Furnishings, Beddings and Towel brands.

name: Swarovski
description: Masters of crystal-cutting, delivering extraordinary everyday style to women around the world. Appreciate the naturally brilliant detail, and be admired for it.

name: Bath & Body Works
description: For over 20 years, Bath & Body Works crafts joy-inducing scents. Explore our range, from lavish body care to exquisite 3-wick candles – perfect for self-indulgence or thoughtful gifts.

name: Foot Locker
description:
Sneakers are our culture.
A source of energy that sparks moments and influences sports and style.
At the center of it all, you’ll find Foot Locker And our iconic stripers. . .
Absorbing all the positivity generated by sneakers.
And pumping it back out into the world.
Engaged in communities. Boosting confidence. Showing up with a blend of passion, knowledge, and taste you can’t get anywhere else.
Holding it down while hyping you up.
Now is the time to put the world on notice and show everyone that Foot Locker is The Heart of Sneakers.

name: Ardene
description:
Ardene, also known as Ardène in some locations, is a Canadian clothing and accessories retailer based in Montreal, Quebec. Since 1982, Ardene has been a one-stop shop for fashion-savvy and value-conscious consumers in North America.
 
Starting out as an accessory and jewellery store, Ardene is now one of the top shopping destinations in North America with over 400 stores and a fast-growing online presence. With a product assortment including clothing, footwear, accessories, jewellery, active wear, intimates, beauty products and more, Ardene makes fashion frugal for the youth.

name: L'Occitane
description: An international cosmetics brand based on essential oils and natural ingredients. Founded in Provence, France, L’Occitane brings nature’s most precious treasures to the Middle East.
